title: Sanders Campaign Busing Youths to Caucuses and Primaries
subtitle: Social media rumors claimed Bernie Sanders bused youthful disruptors to rallies, caucuses, and primaries in order to crowd out  rival "legitimate" voters and participants.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Bernie Sanders's campaign bused fake supporters to rallies, caucuses, and events in order to prevent legitimate attendees from being able to participate.
